size: "The smallest planet in our solar system and cloest to the Sun"
"The second planet from the Sun and is Earth’s closest planetary neighbor."
"The only place we know of so far that’s inhabited by living things."
"A dusty cold desert world with a very thin atmosphere"
"Twice as massive than the other planets of our solar system combined."
"Adorned with a dazzling complex system of icy rings."
"An ice giant the only planet that spins on its side."
"The eighth and farthest-known Solar planet from the Sun"
